author: James Freeman Clarke
message: We are either progressing or retrograding all the while. There is no such thing as remaining stationary in this life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anais Nin
message: The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marcus Aurelius
message: Everything that happens happens as it should, and if you observe carefully, you will find this to be so.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wayne Dyer
message: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
title: Thought of the day
